item.title: What are Real Time Payments?
item.description: What are Real Time Payments? The TLDR is that A real time payment is a payment that is made to a bank account via the RTP network. These are bank to bank transactions that happen instantly and are available nearly 24/7. This is very different from standard ACH transactions which take 3-5 business days for the money to arrive in your bank account. How fast is instant?
